column2: ReTo Eco-Solutions, Inc. engages in the manufacture and distribution of construction materials. The company is headquartered in Beijing, Beijing and currently employs 235 full-time employees. The firm is focused on manufacturing and distributing of eco-friendly construction materials such as aggregates, bricks, pavers and tiles, made from mining waste or iron tailings and fly-ash, as well as equipment used for the production of these eco-friendly construction materials. In addition, the Company provides consultation, design, project implementation and construction of urban ecological environments including those for the purpose of capturing, controlling and reusing rainwater, commonly called sponge cities. The firm offers a range of products such as eco-friendly construction materials, and eco-friendly construction materials manufacturing equipment. The firm also offers ground works materials, landscape retaining materials, hydraulic engineering materials, and wall materials.
C/O Beijing Reit Technology Co. Ltd., 24Th Fl., Bldg. B, Anli Rd., Chaoyang
